channel.title: The Niederhuth Lab
channel.description: Recent content on The Niederhuth Lab

item.title: Chad Niederhuth
item.description: Assistant Professor Contact me Publications 2017 Bewick A. J., C. E. Niederhuth, L. Ji, N. A. Rohr, P. T. Griffin, J. Leebens-Mack, R. J. Schmitz (2017) The evolution of CHROMOMETHYLASES and gene body DNA methylation in plants. Genome Biol 18(1):65. Niederhuth C. E., R. J. Schmitz (2017) Putting DNA methylation in context: from genomes to gene expression in plants. Biochim Biophys Acta. 1860(1): 149-56. 2016 Niederhuth C. E., A. J.

item.title: Coming Soon to MSU
item.description: I’m happy to say that the Niederhuth Lab will be starting at Michigan State University in the Department of Plant Biology on January 1, 2018. Our research focuses on plant genomics and epigenomics using both experimental and computational approaches. If you are interested in joining the lab, please check our current openings!
